snippet.title: Grim Tales: The Bride
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/19N8TxX
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1aNJrL2

After your sister vanishes on her wedding day no one has any idea what happened to her, so it's up to you to find the truth in this new Collector's Edition!

• YOUR SISTER HAS VANISHED!
Your family has been fallen into grief over her apparent death and it's up to you to solve the mystery.

• UNLOCK THE COLLECTOR'S EDITION TO ACCESS THE BONUS CONTENT
Play through a bonus chapter and gain access to wallpapers, soundtracks, concept art and much more!

• RETURN TO THE FAMILY MANSION
Search for hidden clues while being assisted by a demon guide. Immerse yourself in this fantastic storyline with its amazing gameplay.

• TRACE BACK THROUGH LUISA'S MEMORIES!
The demon guide will help you traverse through Luisa's memories of her courtship with her fiancé Gray to find any possible clues about her mysterious disappearance.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
